Name: Escape: VR
About the game: The main objective in this game is to find your way out. Look for hints, notes or anything you could find in order to find the way out. Current features: * Atmosphere based game-play * Story driven puzzles * Different endings (depending on what path you choose) * Random encounters We would also love to heard a feedback from you. For that, please refer to our community forums! Oculus Rift support will be coming within next two months.
Meta Title: Escape: VR: Apr 12, 2017, JapanCo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Escape: VR? Check out the release date (Apr 12, 2017), developer insights from JapanCo, and a complete game summary.
